name: Audaz Business Solutions
tagline: Your company, your vision, your solution
description:
Audaz Business Solutions provides software and consulting services for SAP products for small and mid-sized companies. Audaz is a certified SAP partner and offers both the SAP Business One on-premise solution as well as the SAP Business One on-demand solution. The company has been helping businesses run their businesses better since 2000. We bring to you best practices in implementation and operation of the best solutions for your business.
We believe in helping you improve your processes as well as your systems so that you maximize your employees’ efficiency and leverage your ability to manage your business. We offer the following services: • Software implementation • Ongoing support • Customization and configuration • Report development • Training
